EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-27-HyperFlex-AppD.June_Webinar-2018-06-20-HyperFlex-AppD Email 2b.No
EmailTemplate.subject: [LIVE Webinar] Panelist Discussion Cisco + Turbonomic on App-Aware, Full-Stack Optimization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Cisco and Turbonmic have partnered to bring workload automation to Cisco's intent-based data center. As a Cisco OEM partner, Turbonomic is enabling application and infrastructure to self-manage in real time.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>
Join our live webinar on Wednesday, June 27th at 11 a.m. to learn what happens when you combine AppDynamics, HyperFlex, and Turbonomic, such as:
- Application-Awareness - Cloud Elasticity On-Prem - Super Cluster Optimization - Cloud Migration & Dynamic Optimization
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
